title.narrative: Un-Habitat Technical Assistance To The National Urban Policy Of Cabo Verde

description.narrative:
In this framework, the technical expertise provided will be related to the formulation of an integrated and participative diagnostic that will be the basis for the formulation of the National Urban Policy (NUP), which will comprise the following contents: characterisation and analysis discussion of the legal framework for the NUP; characterisation and analysis discussion of the institutional framework for the NUP; characterisation and analysis discussion of the socio-economic and spatial framework for the NUP; and preliminary guidelines for the NUP.
With regards to the characterisation and analysis discussion of the legal framework for the NUP, the norms of the 1992 Constitution of the Republic of Cabo Verde (2nd Ordinary Review of 2010) will be considered, whose article 72 (Right to housing), par. 2, stipulates that “in order to ensure the right to housing, public authorities are designated to: a) promote the creation of adequate economic, judicial, institutional and infrastructural conditions, inserted in the framework of a national policy of spatial planning and urbanism (our highlight)”. Additionally, all the legal urbanistic regime currently in force in the Republic of Cabo Verde will be subject to scrutiny, and also the legal regime of complementary sectors, such as the environment, historical heritage, local governance, amongst others, and also the adaptation and alignment of this legal regime to the international conventions and commitments to development and human rights adopted by the Republic of Cabo Verde, such as the New Urban Agenda, the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development, the African Union 2063 Agenda, the International Covenant on Economic, Social and Cultural Rights, amongst others.
